TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DataSourceView extends System.Object

summary.span: 用作所有数据源视图类的基类，这些视图类定义数据源控件的功能。

span.span: Serves as the base class for all data source view classes, which define the capabilities of data source controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 支持一种数据绑定体系结构，使 Web 服务器控件能够以一致的方式绑定到数据。ASP.NET supports a data-binding architecture that enables Web server controls to bind to data in a consistent fashion. 绑定到数据的 Web 服务器控件被称为数据绑定控件，而用于简化绑定的类称为数据源控件。Web server controls that bind to data are referred to as data-bound controls, and the classes that facilitate that binding are called data source controls. 数据源控件可以表示任意数据源：关系数据库、文件、流、业务对象等。Data source controls can represent any data source: a relational database, a file, a stream, a business object, and so on. 数据源控件以一致的方式向数据绑定控件提供数据，而与基础数据的源或格式无关。Data source controls present data in a consistent way to data-bound controls, regardless of the source or format of the underlying data. 使用随 ASP.NET 提供的数据源控件（包括 、和 ）来执行大多数 Web 开发任务。You use the data source controls that are provided with ASP.NET, including , , and , to perform most Web development tasks. 如果要实现自己的自定义数据源控件，请使用基本 和 类。You use the base and classes when you want to implement your own custom data source control. 您可以将数据源控件视为 对象及其关联的数据列表（称为数据源视图）的组合。You can think of a data source control as the combination of the object and its associated lists of data, called data source views. 每个数据列表由一个 对象表示。Each list of data is represented by a object. 类是与数据源控件关联的所有数据源视图或数据列表的基类。The class is the base class for all data source views, or lists of data, associated with data source controls. 数据源视图定义数据源控件的功能。Data source views define the capabilities of a data source control. 由于基础数据存储包含一个或多个数据列表，因此数据源控件始终与一个或多个命名数据源视图相关联。Because the underlying data storage contains one or more lists of data, a data source control is always associated with one or more named data source views. 数据源控件使用 方法来枚举当前与数据源控件关联的数据源视图，以及用于按名称检索特定数据源视图实例的 方法。The data source control uses the method to enumerate the data source views currently associated with the data source control and the method to retrieve a specific data source view instance by name. 所有 对象都支持使用 方法从基础数据源中检索数据。All objects support data retrieval from the underlying data source using the method. 所有视图都可以选择支持一组基本操作，包括诸如 、和 等操作。All views optionally support a basic set of operations, including operations such as , , and . 数据绑定控件可以通过使用 和 方法检索关联的数据源视图，以及在设计时或运行时查询视图来发现数据源控件的功能。A data-bound control can discover the capabilities of a data source control by retrieving an associated data source view using the and methods, and by querying the view at design time or run time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展 类，以便为数据源控件创建强类型视图类。The following code example demonstrates how to extend the class to create a strongly typed view class for a data source control. `CsVDataSourceView` 类定义 `CsvDataSource` 数据源控件的功能，并为数据绑定控件提供一个实现，以使用以逗号分隔值（.csv）文件格式存储的数据。The `CsVDataSourceView` class defines the capabilities of the `CsvDataSource` data source control and provides an implementation for data-bound controls to use data stored in comma-separated value (.csv) files. 有关 `CsvDataSource` 数据源控件的详细信息，请参阅 类。For more information on the `CsvDataSource` data source control, see the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/CS/csvdatasource.cs#5)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/VB/csvdatasource.vb#5)]

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示与当前 对象关联的 对象是否支持 操作。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the object associated with the current object supports the operation.

value.span: 如果支持该操作，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the operation is supported; otherwise, .
The base class implementation returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性不仅反映数据源控件的功能，而且还反映它当前是否适用于执行操作。The property reflects not only a capability of the data source control, but also whether it is currently appropriate to perform an operation. 例如，即使数据源视图支持 操作（一般情况下，如果未设置必需的属性或某些其他数据）， 属性也会返回 `false`，因为删除操作会失败。For example, even though a data source view supports the operation in general, if a required property or some other data is not set, the property returns `false`, as a delete operation would fail. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在扩展 类的类中重写 属性和 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the property and the method in a class that extends the class. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/CS/csvdatasource.cs#8)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/VB/csvdatasource.vb#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性不仅反映数据源控件的功能，而且还反映它当前是否适用于执行操作。The property reflects not only a capability of the data source control, but also whether it is currently appropriate to perform an operation. 例如，即使数据源控件支持 操作，如果未设置必需的 insert 命令或某些其他数据，则 属性将返回 `false`，因为插入操作将失败。For example, even though a data source control supports the operation, if a required insert command or some other data is not set, the property returns `false`, as an insert operation would fail. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在扩展 类的类中重写 属性和 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the property and the method in a class that extends the class. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. value.span: 如果支持该操作，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the operation is supported; otherwise, .
The base class implementation returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据绑定控件可以通过将 字段添加到传递到 方法的 对象来请求分页。A data-bound control can request paging by adding the field to the object passed to the method. 如果数据绑定控件请求分页，但 属性返回 `false`，则数据源视图会引发异常。If a data-bound control requests paging, but the property returns `false`, the data source view throws an exception.

Public Custom Event DataSourceViewChanged As EventHandler
public: event EventHandler ^ DataSourceViewChanged;

summary.span: 在数据源视图更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the data source view has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对数据源视图所做的更改可能是由于数据源视图所执行的数据操作更改了其属性值或数据更改引起的。The change to the data source view could be due to a change in the values of its properties, or to a change in the data due to a data operation performed by the data source view. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/).

span.span: A delegate that is used to notify a data-bound control when the asynchronous operation is complete.

summary.span: 对 对象所表示的数据列表执行异步删除操作。

span.span: Performs an asynchronous delete operation on the list of data that the object represents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是所有数据源视图对象的异步数据删除接口。The method is the asynchronous data deletion interface for all data source view objects. 方法使用提供的任何 `keys` 和 `oldValues` 参数值调用 方法。The method calls the method using any `keys` and `oldValues` parameter values supplied. `callback` 参数是数据绑定控件传递到数据源视图的委托，用于在 操作完成时通知数据绑定控件。The `callback` parameter is a delegate that a data-bound control passes to the data source view, which is used to notify the data-bound control when the operation has completed. 方法使用 委托的参数来返回受影响的记录数和 方法引发的任何 异常。The method uses the parameters of the delegate to return the number of affected records and any exception that is thrown by the method.

span.span: The supplied is .

summary.span: 获取数据源视图的事件处理程序委托的列表。

span.span: Gets a list of event-handler delegates for the data source view.

value.span: 事件处理程序委托的列表。

span.span: The list of event-handler delegates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的类型为 ，它使用线性搜索算法查找委托列表中的项。This property is of type , which uses a linear search algorithm to find entries in the list of delegates. 线性搜索算法在处理大量条目时效率低下。A linear search algorithm is inefficient when working with a large number of entries. 因此，当您有一个较大的列表时，查找具有此属性的条目的速度会很慢。Therefore, when you have a large list, finding entries with this property will be slow.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据绑定控件可以通过使用 方法检索 对象并检查 属性来确定数据源控件是否支持 操作。Data-bound controls can determine whether the operation is supported by a data source control by retrieving the object using the method, and checking the property. `keys` 参数表示要删除的数据的对象或行键。The `keys` parameter represents the object or row keys of the data to delete. 对于表示关系数据（如 控件）的数据源，`keys` 参数是数据库主键的集合。For data sources that represent relational data, such as the control, the `keys` parameter is a collection of database primary keys. 在其他情况下，`keys` 参数是名称/值对的集合，用于筛选数据列表。In other scenarios, the `keys` parameter is a collection of name/value pairs and is used to filter a list of data. 与名称/值对匹配的任何数据都将被删除。Any data matching a name/value pair is deleted. > [!NOTE] > 类的默认实现是引发 异常。The class's default implementation is to throw a exception. 如果扩展 类，请重写 方法，前提是你的类支持从基础数据存储中删除。If you extend the class, override the method if your class supports deletion from the underlying data storage. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展 类的类可以重写 属性和 方法。The following code example demonstrates how a class that extends the class can override the property and the method. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/CS/csvdatasource.cs#8)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/VB/csvdatasource.vb#8)]

span.span: The operation is not supported by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据绑定控件可以通过使用 方法检索 对象并检查 属性来确定数据源控件是否支持 操作。Data-bound controls can determine whether the operation is supported by a data source control by retrieving the object using the method, and checking the property. `values` 参数是一组名称/值对，这些名称/值对表示要插入的数据列、字段和相应的值。The `values` parameter is a set of name/value pairs that represents data columns or fields and corresponding values to insert. > [!NOTE] > 类的默认实现是引发 异常。The class's default implementation is to throw a exception. 如果扩展 类，请重写 方法（如果类支持向基础数据存储插入）。If you extend the class, override the method if your class supports insertion into the underlying data storage. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展 类的类可以重写 属性和 方法。The following code example demonstrates how a class that extends the class can override the property and the method. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/CS/csvdatasource.cs#9)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/VB/csvdatasource.vb#9)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal abstract System.Collections.IEnumerable ExecuteSelect (System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments arguments);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerable ExecuteSelect(class System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments arguments) cil managed
Protected Friend MustOverride Function ExecuteSelect (arguments As DataSourceSelectArguments) As IEnumerable
protected public: abstract System::Collections::IEnumerable ^ ExecuteSelect(System::Web::UI::DataSourceSelectArguments ^ arguments);
abstract member ExecuteSelect : System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments -> System.Collections.IEnumerable

param.name: arguments
param.span: 用于请求对数据执行基本数据检索以外的操作的 。

span.span: A that is used to request operations on the data beyond basic data retrieval.

summary.span: 从基础数据存储获取数据列表。

span.span: Gets a list of data from the underlying data storage.

returns.span: 来自基础数据存储的数据的 列表。

span.span: An list of data from the underlying data storage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 方法以从基础数据存储中检索数据，并将其作为 对象返回。The method is called to retrieve data from the underlying data store and return it as an object. 所有数据源控件都支持从其基础数据存储中检索数据，即使不支持插入和排序等其他操作。All data source controls support data retrieval from their underlying data storage, even if other operations such as insertion and sorting are not supported. 由于数据绑定控件可以通过 事件或 方法调用的结果随时请求数据列表，因此必须按需执行数据检索。Because a data-bound control can request a list of data at any time as a result of a event or a method call, the data retrieval must be performed on demand. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写扩展 类的类中的 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a class that extends the class. `CsvDataSourceView` 将打开一个逗号分隔值（.csv）文件，逐行分析它，并创建一个 对象和一个 对象来保存内存中的数据。The `CsvDataSourceView` opens a comma-separated value (.csv) file, parses it line by line, and creates a object and a object to hold the data in memory. 最后，如果 对象提供了一个排序表达式，并将 对象作为 实例返回，则该表达式将被应用。Finally, a sort expression is applied if one is supplied by the object, and the object is returned as an instance. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/CS/csvdatasource.cs#6)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/VB/csvdatasource.vb#6)]

abstract member ExecuteUpdate : System.Collections.IDictionary * System.Collections.IDictionary * System.Collections.IDictionary -> int override this.ExecuteUpdate : System.Collections.IDictionary * System.Collections.IDictionary * System.Collections.IDictionary -> int

param.name: keys
param.span: 更新操作要更新的对象或行键的 。

span.span: An of object or row keys to be updated by the update operation.

param.name: values
param.span: 表示数据元素及其新值的名称/值对的 。

span.span: An of name/value pairs that represent data elements and their new values.

param.name: oldValues
param.span: 表示数据元素及其原始值的名称/值对的 。

span.span: An of name/value pairs that represent data elements and their original values.

summary.span: 对 对象所表示的数据列表执行更新操作。

span.span: Performs an update operation on the list of data that the object represents.

returns.span: 已在基础数据存储中更新的项数。

span.span: The number of items that were updated in the underlying data storage.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据绑定控件可以通过使用 方法检索 对象并检查 属性的值，来确定数据源控件是否支持 操作。Data-bound controls can determine whether the operation is supported by a data source control by using the method to retrieve the object and checking the value of the property. `keys` 参数表示要更新的数据的对象或行键。The `keys` parameter represents the object or row keys of the data to update. 对于表示关系数据（如 控件）的数据源，`keys` 参数是数据库主键的集合。For data sources that represent relational data, such as the control, the `keys` parameter is a collection of database primary keys. 在其他情况下，`keys` 参数是名称/值对的集合，用于筛选数据列表。In other scenarios, the `keys` parameter is a collection of name/value pairs and is used to filter a list of data. 与名称/值对匹配的任何数据都使用 `values` 参数中找到的值进行更新，此参数是一组表示现有字段或列的新值的名称/值对。Any data matching a name/value pair is updated with the values found in the `values` parameter, which is a set of name/value pairs that represents new values for existing fields or columns. > [!NOTE] > 类的默认实现是引发 异常。The class's default implementation is to throw a exception. 如果扩展 类，如果类支持更新基础数据存储中的数据，请重写 方法。If you extend the class, override the method if your class supports updating data in the underlying data storage. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展 类的类可以重写 属性和 方法。The following code example demonstrates how a class that extends the class can override the property and the method. 此代码示例是为 类提供的更大示例的一部分。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/CS/csvdatasource.cs#10)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.CsvDataSource_1/VB/csvdatasource.vb#10)]

abstract member Insert : System.Collections.IDictionary * System.Web.UI.DataSourceViewOperationCallback -> unit override this.Insert : System.Collections.IDictionary * System.Web.UI.DataSourceViewOperationCallback -> unit

param.name: values
param.span: 在插入操作期间使用的名称/值对的 。

span.span: An of name/value pairs used during an insert operation.

param.name: callback
param.span: 用于在异步操作完成时通知数据绑定控件的 委托。

span.span: A delegate that is used to notify a data-bound control when the asynchronous operation is complete.

summary.span: 对 对象所表示的数据列表执行异步插入操作。

span.span: Performs an asynchronous insert operation on the list of data that the object represents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是所有数据源视图对象的异步数据插入接口。The method is the asynchronous data insertion interface for all data source view objects. 方法使用提供的任何 `values` 调用 方法。The method calls the method using any `values` supplied. `callback` 参数是数据绑定控件传递到数据源视图的委托，用于在 操作完成时通知数据绑定控件。The `callback` parameter is a delegate that a data-bound control passes to the data source view, which is used to notify the data-bound control when the operation has completed. 方法使用 委托的参数来返回受影响的记录数和 方法调用引发的任何 异常。The method uses the parameters of the delegate to return the number of affected records and any exception that is thrown by the method call.

span.span: The supplied is .

Protected Overridable Sub OnDataSourceViewChanged (e As EventArgs)
protected: virtual void OnDataSourceViewChanged(EventArgs ^ e);
abstract member OnDataSourceViewChanged : EventArgs -> unit override this.OnDataSourceViewChanged : EventArgs -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: 包含事件数据的 。

span.span: An that contains event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通知数据绑定控件，基础数据源已更改，且控件应重新绑定并执行任何必要的工作。The method notifies a data-bound control that the underlying data source has changed and that the control should rebind and perform any necessary work. 通常，当数据源视图的属性发生更改时，将调用 方法。Typically, the method is called when a property of the data source view has changed. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

param.name: capability
param.span: 与视图支持的功能进行比较的 值之一。

span.span: One of the values that is compared against the capabilities that the view supports.

summary.span: 由 方法调用，用于将 操作所请求的功能与视图所支持的功能进行比较。

span.span: Called by the method to compare the capabilities requested for an operation against those that the view supports.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据源视图使用 方法来检查由传递到 方法的 对象表示的数据绑定控件所请求的每个功能，并将其与数据源视图所支持的功能进行比较。The method is used by the data source view to examine each of the capabilities requested by a data-bound control, represented by the object passed to the method, and compare it to the capabilities supported by the data source view.

exception.span: 数据源视图不支持指定的数据源功能。

span.span: The data source view does not support the data source capability specified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是所有数据源视图对象的异步数据检索接口。The method is the asynchronous data retrieval interface for all data source view objects. 方法将调用 方法，传递提供的任何 。The method calls the method, passing any supplied. `callback` 参数是数据绑定控件传递到数据源视图的委托，用于在 操作完成时通知数据绑定控件。The `callback` parameter is a delegate that a data-bound control passes to the data source view, which is used to notify the data-bound control when the operation has completed. 调用返回的数据在 委托的参数中返回。The data returned by the call is returned in the parameter of the delegate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是所有数据源视图对象的异步数据修改接口。The method is the asynchronous data modification interface for all data source view objects. 方法使用提供的任意 `keys`、`values`和 `oldValues` 参数值调用 方法。The method calls the method using any `keys`, `values`, and `oldValues` parameter values supplied. `callback` 参数是数据绑定控件传递到数据源视图的委托，用于在 操作完成时通知数据绑定控件。The `callback` parameter is a delegate that a data-bound control passes to the data source view, which is used to notify the data-bound control when the operation has completed. 方法使用 委托的参数来返回受影响的记录数和 调用引发的任何 异常。The method uses the parameters of the delegate to return the number of affected records and any exception that is thrown by the call.
